name: Hell of a Racket (itch)
description:
Play as a fallen angel seeking redemption by punishing satanic worshipers who don't play the holiest of sports....tennis! 

Hell of a Racket is a unique twist on an old-school genre. Engage with enemies in a unique way by reflecting projectiles at them with your racket or simply smacking them!

If you playtest, we'd love to hear some feedback! If you can fill out this form it'd be super helpful! - https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeyp1lQ75nhENthkFnelJ93bpzGA7r_AtMS2k-Twf58O6vOLQ/viewform?usp=sf_link
